actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

official_title: Urging the States to include in their driver's license exams at least one question about highway-rail grade crossings safety by fiscal year 2005.

summary.text: Urges the States by FY 2005 to include in their driver's license exams (including commercial driver's license exams) at least one question regarding highway-rail grade crossings safety.

titles.title: Urging the States to include in their driver's license exams at least one question about highway-rail grade crossings safety by fiscal year 2005.
